description:
Beowulf (2007)
IMDb User Rating: 6.7/10

Video
Codec: Divx 6.8

Audio
Codec: AC3
Bitrate: 384 Kbps

This HD movie is playable on xbox360s, PS3s, and HD-capable divx players.

ATTENTION: If you have a divx player that limits files to 2gb, here\&#039;s what you need to do:

1. Download Virtualdubmod at http://www.aud-x.com/index.php?option=com_remository&Itemid=34&func=download&filecatid=3 and install it.

2. Click File>Open File and open the movie file.

3. Press F9, then F10 to disable the video preview to avoid spoilers.

4. At the bottom of the window next to the buttons is a frame counter. To the right of that is a timecounter. To the right of that is a bytecounter. Hold the shift key and press the right arrow key until the bytecounter reads about 2000mb (2gb is 2048mb). This will be about halfway through for a 1/2 DVD (2200mb) release like this one.

5. Press the End key. Go to the very beginning,and press the Home Key. This will select the first 2gb of the movie. Then press the delete key.

6. Open the video menu and select \"Direct Stream Copy.\"

7. Open the File menu and click save as. Choose a file name.

Then you&#039;re pretty much good to go. Burn as usual, and play the file you just made when the original ends.
